tooltip.smeltingmetal.cool_with_water: After filling with Molten Metal, Right-click with water bucket to cool.
tooltip.smeltingmetal.bucket_use: Right click on Metal Case to fill with Molten Metal.
tooltip.smeltingmetal.make_molten_metal_: This metal is so hot, you can only collect it with Bucket in inventory. Cool it down back into Block of Raw Ore with water or time.
tooltip.smeltingmetal.make_filled_mold: This metal is so hot, you can only collect it with Hardened or Netherite Mold in inventory. Cool it down back into Raw Ore with water or time.
